Directions: In a mixing bowl, cream butter and sugars. Add the eggs, one at time, beating well after each addition. Combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon and salt; gradually add to the creamed mixture. Stir in pecans. Shape into four 6-1/2-in. rolls; wrap each in plastic wrap. Refrigerate overnight. Unwrap and cut into 1/8-in. slices. Place 1 in. apart on ungreased baking sheets. Bake at 375 degrees F for 7-10 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove to wire racks to cool.
